title: Annaki
paragraphs: Annaki is a gear brand in Splatoon 2 and Splatoon 3. In Splatoon 2, Annaki gear has a 5× chance to roll Main Power Up (formerly Cold-Blooded before its removal in the version 4.3.0 update) as a secondary ability, and a 0.5× chance of rolling Special Saver. In Splatoon 3, Annaki gear has a 5× chance to roll Ink Saver (Sub) as a secondary ability, and a 0.5× chance of rolling Special Saver.
Annaki gear is inspired by the post-punk culture and fashion commonly associated with anarchist movements.
The Annaki logo appears to be a stylized squid or Jellyfish inside a circle, forming a loose "A". A capital "A" enclosed in a circle is also a traditional symbol of anarchism.
For the category page, see Category:Annaki.
Reaching a cumulative amount of stars on Annaki gear will reward the player with badges.
Annaki sounds similar to "anarchy" (especially in non-rhotic dialects), which references the fact that it is inspired by anarchist movements.
- Information from The Art of Splatoon 2.
- A collage of Inklings wearing various pieces of Annaki gear.
- A Jellyfish wearing an unnamed Annaki shirt.
- An advertisement for Annaki seen in The Reef.
- A promotional image for Splatoon 3 showing Annaki gear.
